sources.title: Blackhawk Colorized
sources.description: A flying squadron of WW2 veterans led by that fearless champion of freedom Blackhawk (Kirk Alyn) and hid sidekick Chuck (John Crawford) uncovers a gang of foreign spies, led by the notorious Laska (Carol Forman), who are conspiring to steal (1) a deadly electronic Ray device invented by Dr. Rolph (William Fawcett), and (2) a new super-fuel called Element X that has attracted the interest of Mr. Case (Michael Fox). 15 chapters I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
